sentences.english: This is because eggs are full of vitamin B12 as well as lecithin.
sentences.chinese: 这是因为鸡蛋富含维生素B12和卵磷脂。

sentences.english: The whole wheat germs contain lecithin.
sentences.chinese: 完整的小麦胚芽含有卵磷脂。

sentences.english: Other Ingredients: Vegetable Oil, Gelatin, Glycerin, Yellow Beeswax, Soy Lecithin.
sentences.chinese: 动物油，明胶，甘油，黄蜂蜡，大豆卵磷脂。

sentences.english: That is why I suggest the granule form to you.
sentences.chinese: 这就是为什么我建议食用颗粒卵磷脂。

sentences.english: Conclusion The lecithin could play a very importan…
sentences.chinese: 结论卵磷脂对皮肤具有保健作用。

sentences.english: The study is extracting lecithin from soybean oil.
sentences.chinese: 对从大豆毛油中提取卵磷脂的工艺进行了研究。

sentences.english: Langde goose fat liver have plenty of lecithin.
sentences.chinese: 鹅肥肝中营养物质丰富，且富含卵磷脂。

sentences.english: Lecithin helps ease the problem of the hardening of the arteries, which often impairs brain functioning.
sentences.chinese: 卵磷脂有助于减轻常影响大脑功能的动脉硬化问题。

sentences.english: Lecithin is also a very good source of potassium.
sentences.chinese: 同时卵磷脂也含有大量的钾。

sentences.english: And lecithin can enhance the excretion of liver function.
sentences.chinese: 而且卵磷脂能增强肝的排泄功能。

sentences.english: This product has been concentrated to contain 3 times the phosphatidyl choline found in ordinary lecithin.
sentences.chinese: 该产品已含有3倍于普通卵磷脂磷脂胆碱。

sentences.english: Lecithin Nearly always produced from soya beans , though can be produced from eggs .
sentences.chinese: 卵磷脂几乎总是产生的大豆，虽然可以产生卵子。

sentences.english: Beta-carotene also works with lecithin to maintain the body's mucous membranes.
sentences.chinese: 胡萝卜素也适用于粘膜与卵磷脂，以保持身体的。

sentences.english: Highly pure phosphatidylcholine from egg yolk can be used as good emulsifier in the high-energy infusion.
sentences.chinese: 高纯度的卵磷脂可作为高能油脂输液的乳化剂。

pinyin: bu4 bao3 he2 zhi1 fang2 suan1

definition: choline (amine related to vitamin B complex)
